radiographic_examinations.findings: Lower lungs unremarkable; liver normal in size and shape, smooth borders, normal signal, no focal lesions, mild perihepatic and perisplenic fluid; status post cholecystectomy with common bile duct measuring up to 0.6 cm, no identifiable calculi; pancreas normal; spleen homogeneous and mildly enlarged (14 cm), accessory splenule noted; kidneys normal; gastrointestinal tract unremarkable; no lymphadenopathy; normal vascularity; no worrisome osseous lesions, no acute fractures, moderate lumbar spondylosis.
